column6: "BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE" Part 3 (of 4) Gambit and Rogue's tumultuous relationship reaches its ultimate breaking point! Will Gambit give in to his desires and find love in the arms of another woman? Also, the X-Men consider a new member â€" one of their greatest foes of all time!
